topics.body:
"@Shadow the Hedgehog":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/545ad8e36368721386590000#post_545ad8e36368721386590000

there is 6 main acts

there is 2 intermissions before act 6

act 5 is divided in 2 sub acts.

act 6 is divived in 6 sub acts.

after every sub act there is 1 intermission

act 6 act 5 is divived in 3 sub acts

and act 6 act 6 is divived in 4 more sub acts with intermissions in between
